notEnoughChars: You must enter at least @chars characters!
ariaNavigatedToSolution: Navigated to newly included sample solution after textarea.

taskDescription:
The HO scale for model trains is the most common size of model trains. This scale is <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mn>1</mn>
  <mo>:</mo>
  <mn>87</mn>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">1:87</annotation></semantics></math>. If a real locomotive is 73 feet long, how long should the model locomotive be (in inches)? Round your answer to the nearest inch.
